articles.description: Musk has flirted before with the philosophical concept that our reality - and all of us in it - is just a simulation in a computer somewhere in another reality that we can never access or perceive.
articles.content: In the latest slice of bizarre from the private life of Elon Musk, the tech titan believes that ex-girlfriend Grimes is so perfect that she must be a simulation he created in his mind, according to a… [+10329 chars]

articles.title: Cartoon Network dispels shutdown rumors: "Y'all we're not dead" - Business Insider
articles.description: The network assuaged worried fans that it is sticking around, after parent company Warner Bros. Discovery laid off staffers as part of consolidation.
articles.content:
Cartoon Network is not going anywhere, despite rumors to the contrary.
